Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware

Class Messenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware.Messenger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client, Connection
    public abstract class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the methods related to the exchange of messages between the agents of the middleware.

        java.io.IOException - in case of errors while writing on the socket.

      • callMethod

        public void callMethod​(java.lang.String methodName,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.Object> args)
        Retrieves the object on which to call the method using the methodMap, and delegates the actual call to the low level callMethod.
        Parameters:
        methodName - the triggered method name.
        args - the list of arguments of the call.

      • callMethod

        public void callMethod​(Message msg)
        High level interface to achieve the call method stored in the message through reflection. Unpacks the message and delegates the operation to the lower level callMethod.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message storing the requested method call.

      • callMethod

        private void callMethod​(java.lang.Object target,
                        java.lang.String methodName,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Object> args)
        Low level implementation of reflection to call a method on a target object.
        Parameters:
        target - the object to call the method on.
        methodName - the name of the method to call.
        args - the list of arguments of the call.
